title: raama manavini (swarajathi)
sahitya:
rAmA manavi vinumA ravikulAbdhi sOma

caraNam 1

 nA moravinE doravu nIve karuNincumika
 
caraNam 2

 sArasAkSa nI padamule cAla namminAnu gadara

madhyama kaalam

kAmakOTi sama sundara kAmitArtha phala dAyaka 
nA duritamulantunu mika tAmasamiTu sEya tagadu
 
caraNam 3

 nanu viDa nADaga mana sunacalamencaka mari 
kanikaramuna nElE vibhuDanucu ninnu sharaNaNtini
 
caraNam 4

 nI padamula daNDamuliTinAnu gadara brOcuTakidi 
manci samayamau gadasatyAmbudi vikadA niratamu
 
caraNam 5

 shrI raghuvara vinumA mAnava tanu dhara nAnA- 
vidhamula ninu nE nEmarakanu satatAshrita jana
rakSaka sanakAdinuta nAma harE sujana
hrdaya lOlayanucu rAmapura guruvarayani vEDiti
